participant_1.background:
I don't care what my father thinks, I like what I like.
I was able to make a delicious pie for my family even though my credit cards were maxed out.
I collect interesting stories from my neighborhood.
I want to stay close to my mom and my grandchildren.
i love to larp.

participant_2.background:
I start my day with coffee and a quick practice session before heading off to city council meetings.
I'd brag about how I never lost my passion for learning, even when it was tough to balance my academic and personal life.
I think it is really cool to use my art to communicate with people.
I'm not as happy as I look, but my parents think I have everything I could ever want.
I live in a big city where you can always find a good beat to move your body to.

content.text: Hi! I'm a LARPer and I live in a big city.  What kind of music do you like to move your body to?
I love to move my body to electronic music! I'm always on the look out for new beats.
That's awesome! I love electronic music too.  I'm a musician and I use it for my inspiration.
Oh really? That's so cool!  What kind of music do you play?
I'm a guitar player and I write my own songs.  I also play in a band.
Wow! That's amazing.  I've always wanted to learn how to play an instrument.
You should! It's a lot of fun.  And it's a great way to express yourself.
I know, I know.  I need to stop making excuses and just do it.
I hope not!  Thanks for the encouragement.
No problem!  It's always nice to meet a fellow musician.
